content.detailedDescription:
So i was driving home from bonner springs and i decided to go down 147th street because it takes me straight to 10th st. so i see a cluster of lights at first im thinking those are really bright lights for a tower because they werent moving but i didnt remember there ever being a tower where the lights where. so i continue driving and i realize the lights are getting closer to me. and its not a helicopter and it was way to low to be a plane...So my second guess was a blimp because it was moving really slow like a blimp would. it went over the street i was on and almost over my car. i slowed down because i didnt want to get directly under it but i did see the lights there where 3 bright lights in the shape of a triangle and it was moving slow it was 3 times the size of my car. to keep it short it slowly went over the road and over a field that was to my right i wanted to follow it but there was a weird amount of traffic on this back road. really weird experience.
i know more people had to of seen what i saw. i looked online to see it anyone reported anything...And nothing. oh yeah it emitted no sound what so ever.
content.summary: Weird lights and craft

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were leaving my house and were getting in her car when i pointed out some strange lights behind her. the lights, i think 4 or 5 total were slowly moving in different directions out south towards nothing. our airport is the opposite direction and there is really only residential areas and desert in the direction where the lights were. these lights faded in and out a few times. we only viewed them for about a minute. my brother happened to be outside for about 30 seconds and caught a picture. i recorded video. my friend and i drove toward the direction where we thought they were to a field where nothing would be blocking our view shortly after the last light faded but the lights were gone.. this happened around 8pm. if you see the video you'll be able to tell how my friend and i were reacting, we were both freaking out.
content.summary: Small lights appeared then disappeared, some moved in a seemingly random direction, some were stationary.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of my house and witnessed a large glowing red/orange object above me that traveled south to south west with no erratic movements.
content.summary: Glowing object

content.detailedDescription: I have never seen something like this , the way it moved caught my eye right away . i tried to film w my phone i was just to late . red and green lights . why would a ufo carry those lights .I just know that nothing on this earth can move the way this did impossible , im 40 years old i have been around the block i cannot explain the movement of this thing .Im only stating what i saw. i have nothing else to say
content.summary: I have never sean anything that could move like this up down sideway all in a matter of less than 1 second traveling over maybe 30 to 50 miles like nothing like it was a joke ....

content.detailedDescription: There is a very bright light that shines each night. it is first visible in south west sky from my house and moves west each night until it out of site. most people would think it is a star or planet but when looked at though binoculars you see what looks like the bright ball of light on the tower in the night sky line of dallas tx. with a dark line that travel top to bottom or sometimes right to left. i took a photo and blew it up and you can see a dark red sphere in the center of the lights. i first noticed it because it is super bright even more so than the moon and out shines a full moon.
content.summary: Looks like the ball of lights like on the dallas sky line

content.detailedDescription: I was outside talkin with a nieghbor ,turned and looked south ,noticed what i thought was a star at first ,noticed it wasmovingtowards us then turned odd to my left goin n.E. and then turned staraight east ,my friend left to go to restxurant ,i followed it to another close nieghborr ,her dogs barked and she came out i showed it to her she followed it with me and watched it change from bright whiotew to a dull white also flashoing yellow at this point ,we watched it there 4 approx 5 min ,then i tsaid to her ,im moving to get a better angle and went in fild and watcjhed it for another 24 minutes was watching it when it just disappeared and i came in to send this to u at  m.U.F.U.N.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White ball flew path then stopped hovered andthen went dim and was flashing white and yellow

content.detailedDescription:
The witness reported seeing lights in the sky in a rural area near santa clara, california, in october of 1969 (possibly 1968).  it appeared as though spotlights were being shined as the object, which he could not see, followed a fence line.  he reported that the movement did not resemble that of a convention airplane or helicopter.  he watched this "light show" for over an hour, saying that for some strange reason he had no "will to call the police" during this sighting.  

the witness is 74 years old and is an air force veteran.  he decided to come forward with this story after reading about doug helbling, and oregon mufon investigator, in a local oregon newspaper article.  more information about this witness's history with oregon mufon can be received by directly contacting doug helbling (who submitted this cms report).  doug was asked by the witness to submit a cms report on his behalf, since he has "limited computer skills".  the email address he provided is for his daughter, who he lives with.
content.summary: Object with bright lights followed the fence line in rural area

content.detailedDescription:
The witness reported this sighting after leaving a phone message on the mufon hq telephone number.  he indicated that he had spoken with someone in oregon mufon some time back, but could not confirm who or when.  apparently he did not receive the sort of detailed response he was hoping for.  what he wants is to know whether other similar objects to the one he has have been seen elsewhere, in oregon and around the country.

his account of the incident is as follows:
- say a tube shaped object, straight and smooth, camouflage-colored but predominantly green, flying near his home at about 50 mph.  the object had no fins.  the witness is 100% convinced this was a terrestrial military aircraft of some kind. 

the witness is willing to provide additional information once this case is filed into cms.  as the chief investigator for oregon, i will request of our sd that this case be assigned to me for follow-up, since i have established an initial rapport with the witness.
content.summary: Camoflauge-painted tubular object about 14 feet long going 50 mph

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing out on my front steps smoking a cigaret before  bed.
i heard cats fighting it sounded like and then a terrible sound of them being attacked and torchered so loudly that it sounded like a baby with a blood curdling scream over and over. this went on for about five minutes.
i was just thinking to myself im glad its not me or my cat, i felt terrible about it because there was nothing i could do about it and i was not going to trample into the woods and jungle across the street to find out. there are a lot of wild animals out here so you see a lot of them and hear them to.
at first i noticed that this basketball object lifted out of the woods silently, i thought is was a kids remote control device, but then i realized quickly that it was not and it made no sound, so i was mesmerized and just watched it come closer to the road. i was trying to figure out what it was and kept stepping out till i tripped of the front step. i looked up and it started crossing the road and lifted up to the power lines and just hovered there for a few minutes, my power lines are very low so this was close.
then it was crossing over the power lines and coming down towards the north end of the house, at this point i said out load, o my this is not of this world, it heard me and started coming towards me. i panicked and ran into the house and locked the door and ran for the phone, i called three people to tell them to come to my house that i was scared and i wanted to leave and not be there by my self. i even called roger sugden whom everyone knows and had him and his wife on my phone for over a hour trying to calm me down. needless to say i did not go to sleep that night. the next day i told my son about it. he went over to the neighbors and they said they had been out side earlier and seen it too, they were walking a friend out to there vehicle. so i went over and asked her what she seen, she described the same thing and was a little freaked out by the whole thing too.
content.summary: It would move when i started talking out load, like it jerked and heard me, then came towards me  i ran into my house and locked the door in fear

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1. i stepped outside to have a smoke around 11:45 pm on 12/6/2013 and to my surprise off to the north about a mile ahead and 500 to 700 feet off the ground were 3 glowing orbs that moved silently across the sky from north to north west. they burned and glowed like a ball of fire and was reddish yellowish and orange in color. i watched them literally fade right before my eyes and ascend to the heavens. i ran inside to wake up my mom and tell her i saw a ufo. she woke up and came outside to have a look and from the same direction 2 more orbs appeared and followed the same flight path of the first 2 objects we watched them move from north to west and disappear in the same fashion. then i ran inside to find the camera and another orb appeared from the same direction and did the same thing. this time i was able to snap about 5 photos of the object in the sky and over the houses in my complex. this was like nothing i have ever seen and probably will never see again with my own eyes.

2. the sky was clear and full of bright white stars shinning, these 3 objects were 5 times as big as the stars from where i stood and were glowing like balls of fire. i starred as hard as i could at the object to make out its shape and it looked like the shape was continuously changing like liquid.

3.I new exactly what it was when i saw it, an orb. i've watched almost every episode of ufo hunters on the history channel. my experience was identical to other peoples encounters with orbs. they were not flares and there were no airplane or helicopters in the air. only the moon stars and orbs!
 
4. the object was round in shape with no definitive edges or curves. it glowed like a ball of fire and was hovering about 500 to 700 feet off the ground. they moved from north to west across the night sky. the orb maintained the same altitude the whole time until it disappeared before my eyes. (i have photo evidence not developed yet)
content.summary: 3 orbs followed by 5-10 orbs lit up the sky like little balls of fire then dissapeared upwards out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard and saw a light coming across the sky towards me but did not think much of it as a lot planes fly over heading to bergstrom airport.  as the light came through the trees i saw that it was actually two lights, they came out in the open and slowed down and then began to go backwards and arch towards the west and then move south.  when the lights switched direction they were rotating around each other making no noise.  they were moving north to south then west and back to the south.  they got behind the house so i ran in and told my wife to come with me and see what i  had seen.  we went to the front yard but did not see the lights.  my wife thought i was crazy but i know what i saw and i have no explanation for it.
content.summary: Two orbs rotating around each other moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: just about 21:30 hrs , many people began reporting on social media of seeing strange lights over evansville and other cities , as reports continued , also reports of a flash of the lights i=on the ground in areas of the lights , went out momentarily . we went out to investigate and hoped to get photo of event . as we decided to return in , just as we approached the deck , three orbs (without knowing the distance , guessing them at five hundred feet ,they would be 40 or 50 feet in diameter at that guessed distance . seemed to hover momentarily , street light flickered almost out , then the objects just left south towards webster county , leaving a faint streak , then gone . we did not get a photo . many say they did , in evansville , even reported by the police and dispatch .
content.summary: Heard reports , went out to see , finally noticed three orbs about 500ft then left.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking toward a building on campus and as i got closer (sky no longer covered by trees) i noticed a light gray diamond-shaped object hovering near but far above the building i was heading toward. a side of it was sort of shimmering as the sunlight hit it and this caught my attention. at first, it was not moving -- it was hovering in one place in the sky. i did not think of anything it could be when i first saw it, but i knew it looked strange, i had never seen such a thing in the sky (especially in that location) ever before, and i knew it was not an airplane because planes do not simply stay in one location in the sky and are not diamond-shaped.

the diamond-shaped object continued to hover in the same location in the sky for about 5-10 minutes, but i can't say an exact time. after observing it for some time, it suddenly disappeared. i then heard a loud almost "waving" noise. it's difficult to describe -- when i took notes on what i saw that day, i wrote "a little like the sound of an airplane flying, but different" ...The noise was slightly similar to the sounds that i would hear airplanes in new york city make, but it had more of a "wave" to it, for lack of a better word. the object reappeared across the sky (to my right) and it was moving very quickly. i watched until it moved too far away for me to see it.

while viewing the object in the sky, i was confused, of course. i also found it strange that no one else was looking to the sky...
content.summary: Shimmering diamond shaped object hovering, disappears, then noise heard as it reappeared in the distance and was moving away fast...

content.detailedDescription: On may 29, at 9:05 pm, as i took our dog outside our townhouse, a purple, dome-shaped ufo with a rotating pink ring 1/3 of the way up the object, was hovering 50 to 100 feet above our townhouse. i ran inside to get my cellphone and told my wife to come outside. the appliance alarms were going off and i smelled electrical discharge from a surge protector. we both were standing in our courtyard watching the object move in an up-and-down fashion above our townhome. it then slowly moved to the west. i had my droid razr phone up and ready to photograph the object, but the screen stayed black until the instant it crossed behind the treeline to the west. the sighting lasted about 4 to 5 minutes. as a classically-trained guitarist, i regularly perform (play guitar) on our deck, as well as project my positive thoughts to the universe. i feel the sighting may be related to this fact. (*entered by the georgia state director from witness form1 sent via email*.)
content.summary: Purple, dome-shaped ufo with a rotating pink ring hovering 50-100 feet above our townhouse

content.detailedDescription: Me, my, girlfriend and my grandfather were outside smoking a cigarette and just having a normal conversation when i noticed something out of the corner of my eye, i got everyone's attention and the turned to look and we all saw a triangular shaped object with lights on each corner rotating in the sky. we watched it turn for about 2 or 3 min then the lights started to form a straight line, after the line was formed 2 of the lights slowly started dropping slowly towards the earth and the remaining light moved upward. then when the stopped moving two airplanes flew straight threw the path of the 3 lights as if nothing were there after the first plane flew threw, 2 lights went out then as the second plane was coming threw the 2 lower lights re appeared, briefly then all 3 lights went out.
content.summary: I saw a triangular shaped object that rotated and then changed shape.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i came back from a joy ride in his first car, we parked on the street, because i lived in an apartment building, so we had to walk about 3 blocks. 
at that time i lived in fleetwood which is in mount vernon, ny. just north of the bronx in westchester county. the sighting took place on gramatan ave. in front of my building. i looked up as i always did and found it to be a very clear night, i was able to see many stars as i usually don't, mostly due to pollution. my friend was also impressed with the night sky.

we noticed a huge object coming from the north. i thought it was a blimp. my friend said that it did not look like a blimp, as it got closer and he was right!
it was shaped as what i call a "benjamin franklin kite" the kind he used to discover electricity. 3 points up front and one in the back. these points were solid non blinking lights and when we looked up at it, it was black and the outline from the lack of stars gave it the "kite" appearance. 
it looked as big as a football field, it had no sound, just quiet, and cruising slowly south towards the bronx.
we did not follow or wait for it to pass our heads as i fumbled with the keys and entered to side door. we then ran to the elevator, and i said lets go back. so we went to the lobby where we were behind glass. though we could not see it, we stepped out in front of the building and seen it moving deeper south.

we where questioning if it was a blimp, the facts are there was no blinking markers, it was not shaped like a football, no sounds and it was way larger then any vehicle we have ever seen.
content.summary: Diamond shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling on 12/2/13 at 2200 hrs, keep in mind i am in the middle of nowhere with no city lights, it was pitch black besides the night sky. i witnessed what appeared to be a shooting star. i immediately got the attention of my wife so she could see the shooting star also. rather than the shooting star burning off like i have seen in the past this one continued to burn entering the atmosphere, with a bright blueish-white train the shooting star then turned a greenish color and hit the earth's surface. i clearly saw the object make impact with the ground because i was at an elevated viewpoint. once the object made impact my wife and i saw it burst into a green-yellow-red glowing light (like a bomb would in a movie) behind a segment of trees. we were so baffled that we drove off the main road onto some country roads towards where we saw the object hit. after about 10 mins i realized there would be no way for me to accurately find the object without an aeriel view being that the night sky could distort the actual distance the object landed off the road. we gave up our search and now i have tried to contact anyone who will help me try and locate this object for historical and scientific purposes. i contacted the chief investigator, fletcher gray, he seemed to be very interested. please contact me, i feel this is extremely important for the scientific community.
content.summary: I witnessed the ufo make impact with the earth's surface and explode

content.detailedDescription: I just heard peter davenport last night on coast to coast am and started screaming because i thought he was reporting what i saw tuesday night, and then i realized the sightings were two days apart! my sighting sounds just like last night's in davenport, fl except that i live in clermont (the next town north of davenport), and it happened tuesday night 12/3/13, around 7:45 pm est while i was sitting in my backyard. the ufo was traveling from north to south in the area west of highway 27! i actually saw it go down for a minute (then it got blocked from view by my neighbors large house), and then it came back up after a minute. it traveled a little more and disappeared. it was flashing colors from orange to red. around the same time a jet airliner with bright red lights showed up. i found another report from 7/20/13 in davenport, fl reporting the same thing, including the jet airliner that came from east to west. the details were identical to mine! i saw several other ufos around the same time also flashing orange to red, but the one that went down and then up really caught my attention because there are no airports in that area; so i wondered where on earth he could be going if he was going down to land. orlando airport is east of us, the direction the jet came from, but the ufo was in the west. nothing there but empty fields.
content.summary: Ufo traveling from north to south near clermont, fl area; went down, then up, and then disappeared across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting took place last monday, december 2, 2013, at 11:28 pm. working on my computer at home [shenandoah @ chalmers] when i heard the distinct interference pattern of two helicopters flying low in the area. went to the kitchen window [south facing] and noticed what seemed to be a police chopper with its searchlight on sweeping both down [vertical] and ahead [horizontal] from it, flying open circles above what might have been the pico-robertson intersection. i could also see what seemed to be a fighter jet [different light pattern] further south from the helicopter, heading slowly east, as if leaving the area while still surveying. my apartment is located right beneath the path for private planes doing the burbank-santa monica circuit so i'm familiar with flight routes in the area; i can tell you that the plane was not in one of them. he was also flying rather low, 400 to 500 feet, if that. my attention was then briefly distracted to a point right above my window, where the second helicopter entered my field of view as it flew towards the other chopper. as i followed the new helicopter progress, i noticed it aiming for -and focusing its searchlight on- a flaming object, or rather, a cone/teardrop shaped object hovering horizontally [the tip was facing forward] right below and in front of the first helicopter. the ufo looked like a floating fireball, and on close inspection, i noticed it was covered in numerous short flames that seemed to come out of small nozzles distributed all along its surface. you could tell it wasn't a regular aircraft, the contrast with the lights, patterns, and manner of flight of the two helicopter was just striking. i first assumed it was a chinese lantern that had caught fire, or maybe a remote-controlled ufo toy, but it's size was rather big [helicopter size, at least] and its flight slow and on a level, in what felt like a controlled hover. i could follow the sounds and interferences of the two helicopters as they moved around, and not once i heard any sound other than those of the choppers. only then i recalled the numerous fireball reports that are everywhere these days, and thought '...So this must be what they call fireballs...' once i realized this, i hesitated a few seconds between staying glued to the window, waking up my wife for a second witness, or running for the video camera. i ran for the camera as the object was slowly coming my way [slowly heading north] it took me about 10 seconds to get back, and leaning on the glass, i zoomed all the way in [10x] and started taping the ufo. i could see the ufo had turned west by now, and the orange-yellow flames were now bright orange, still crawling to a slow pace [5 mph]. then in a few seconds, it seemed to pickup some speed and went totally red, then dark red. what happened next is hard to describe - it either turned off its fiery nozzles immediately [hard to do as it should still show some glow from heated elements] or flew away from me so fast it gave the impression of turning itself off. i looked for it straining my eyes to see if i could detect a shape in the dark, but nothing. right before this you could 'feel' the ufo, you knew something was there. but then it was gone, off, zipped, and you could feel the void. right after this vanishing act, the second helicopter left, while the first chopper remained in the area for another 20 minutes. 

i checked the short video, but for some reason the focus went crazy, possibly due to the low light conditions. that said, you can still see the ufo shrinking in size to a dot, pretty weird. i will try to upload it soon. also, i would love to get in touch with the couple that saw this vary same ufo in the area, it would be great to try to triangulate its position from out viewing points. although everything they reported matches to the dot with what i saw, i realized the dates and hours are different, so maybe there's a recurrent phenomenon here, maybe even a hi-tech prankster at work.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flaming ufo chased by helicopters above pico-robertson area in los angeles - same ufo from case 52627!

content.detailedDescription: Traveling north bound on the 101 freeway i noticed a red fireball with a tail and aura around it at my 2 o'clock. i brought it to the attention of my passenger as the object moved horizontally across the sky to our 11 o'clock, it appeared to slow down and hovered in place for about 45 sec. in that 45 sec the object lost its tail and seemed to diminish a bit resembling a red star.   the object then changed direction going out towards the atmosphere and gaining a tailing again as if picking up speed turned a bright red and disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red hovering fireball changing directions

content.detailedDescription: On around november 1st at around midnight i had just been done having with my gf and decided to go outside out back on the deck for a cigarette i was about half way done my smoke when i started hearing a strange pulsating noise coming from behind and above me, the moment i heard the sound i knew it sounded like a ufo. afraid i turned around and looked up and froze i knew i was clearly looking at a ufo. when i turned around and seen this craft i knew i had to remember as much as i can about what i was seeing. i will promise on my sons life that my description on what i seen and am about to say is all 100% real and very accurate. after hearing the pulsating noise i turned around almost instantly and what i seen froze me with shock.. above my gfs house about 50-100ft away from me was a circular craft no bigger than 5feet in diameter it had 5 yellowish orange lights along the side all evenly placed around the edge of this craft the lights stayed on they did not blink or anything. almost immediatly as i turned around and seen this ufo it flew faster than anything possible known to humans in an upward right turn motion. i watched this craft and its lights dissapear into space in a matter of seconds i ran inside to tell my gf but she did not belive me thoufht i was crazy so since then i havnt told anyont till i found you guys! thank you! :) i know im not crazy lol please contact me in any way possible if i can be of more help this report is 100% real and i'm still shook up about the whole thing.
content.summary: Heard ufo hovering above the house sooon as i seen it it took off so fast nothing possible by human technologyns

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I had just exited the gerrard square shopping center a little after 7pm and saw a large bright red light hovering over the buildings to my south west. it was a very cloudy evening and the light was under the clouds, but not reflecting light onto them or onto the buildings below. i watched the light for at least ten minutes, it never moved or flashed or did much of anything other than hover. it was larger and brighter than an average star. at around 7:15 a plane flew by just under the light, it appeared closer than the light but the lights on the plane were obviously flashing and smaller, it also did not reflect light on the clouds. as i continued moving west i noted that it seemed to be hovering directly south of carlaw ave and gerrard st, i lost sight of it as i moved westward.

i told a friend at work about it and she said that she and her sister had witnessed the same thing at around the same time, a bright hovering red light. my coworker told me that her sister continued to watch it until it simply faded out. they both live near markham rd and lawrence ave say that they have seen this phenomenon on multiple occasions south west of them and have never been able to find an explanation for it.

i went searching around google maps to see if there were any towers or anything where i saw the light and i do see a few stacks on top of buildings near where the light may have been, but none of the stacks are even close to being tall enough to be visible from where i was standing.
content.summary: Bright red light hovering under cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: We took photo of the objects
content.summary: We took photo of the objects

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the garden dog was taking a leak and i was looking up at the stars it was a very frosty clear night and the stars were very clear  to my great astonishment a triangular shaped bright orange /red light ,, it looked as though it came out of the darkness from the south heading north and disappeard back into the darkness at amazing speed at first i was like wow and then i felt privileged to have seen something that people dont see in a lifetime dont know what it was .
content.summary: Outside looking at stars while dog was in garden seen a triangular bright red orange light shoot across sky at amazing speed then it was gone breathtaking

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i were watching a noisy helicopter hovering two blocks away. after turning away for a moment, i saw a flaming orange and red shape hovering roughlyidqay between is and the chopper. the glowing flaming object was about 1/2 way between us and the helicopter,
just above the tree line, now abot 3/4 of a city block from us.
 the bright object was amorphous, i could see flames rising from parts of it. the shape was rather fluid, morphing a bit like mercury, changing shapes. it it looked a
bit like a pair of wings to me at times, my wife saw a triangle as well, as did i, as it flowed smoothly into different forms of bright glowing orange red light.
it was perfectly silent.
it was not an airplane, drone, chopper, or toy hover craft or miniature chopper.
 it hovered, came towards us a bit, dipped down 20 degrees, swung due west, and eventually arced up steeply and went black or vanished abruptly.
it was a clear night in the pico - robertson area of los angeles, near 8 pm
the object was most dramatic and out of place, yet- no one seemed to notice oneoremlight in the sky. as i pointed it out to my wife, it seemed to flow a bit brighter, and definately moved innocently a bit closer to us, or rather in our direction, and seemed to present a bit of a flourish 
in our direction as it made it's exit, in a steep upward angle.
it looked like firey glowing wings a
good bit, which is meaningful to me personally; also, my
wife is an indian tribal member, and her tribe's name translates as "keepers of the fire"
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Firey orange red glow,silent, helicopter sized, moving obliquely, ascending steeply

content.detailedDescription: Photo was taken outside of work- it was a photo of the sky, because it looked beautiful. i didn't think much of the photo, until a year later, when i was looking through my old pictures on my phone. it seemed to be a strange, blue object, shaped like an upside down cone and gave off strange white lights.  it looked really bizarre and unnatural.
content.summary: Not seen until year later in a photograph.

content.detailedDescription:
Well i don't know from where to start,this is 3-rd time in 2 months the same ufo appears here...So the first time a friend of mine saw it and said that it was just like a disc with some red-blue lights flashing or turning below...

10 days ago me and my girlfriend were sitting and enjoy the night,and we saw a very bright white light just standing in the sky around a hill and that was fine...I thought it was some radio transmitter or something like that on the hill...But after 2-3 minutes the light started to move and we were watching,it just blink one time and then it just disappear...Not moving faster or something...But just disappear at front of our eyes...But at that time we didn't have anything to magnify...So i took my binoculars in my car in case to appear sometime again...In the mean time i bought a funny telescope for 30 euros to watch the moon and stuff so the telescope also was in my car...And tonight just tonight after exactly 10 days at the same time and the same place the same light appeared again...So my girlfriend took the binoculars and i went to the telescope even for 30 euros i assemble it in 15 seconds :) she was watching the light with the binoculars and i laid down on the ground wi! th the scope and i was searching for the light...The light again was just standing still at the sky...So while i was looking for it in the sky the light started slowly to go up in the sky...And i found it on the scope...When i set the scope magnification i was stunned....I saw a disc shape ufo...The ufo was moving little bit faster and faster...But tonight it doesn't disappear...Tonight was coming toward us..Actually above us...On height like a chopper fly...There was no sound at all !!!When it was flying above us i took the binoculars and saw it below the ufo...Now i was very very sure that it was disc shape with some red and blue and white lights just like my friend described 1 month ago...And believe me it was a sight to remember...This was my second time in my life to see it so close above me...The first time was in 1995 when there was an earthquake in this town...And back then it was pyramid shape...With very bright white lights below...From all ufo pictures around the! internet i haven't found pyramid shape ufo....Imagine a real ! pyramid- --just a little smaller,flying.
content.summary: Disc with 3 pulsating light under it blue-white-red

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car waiting for it to warm up when  i saw beams of light in the distance. a couple of seconds later i saw a beam that was flashing (almost like lightning but straight up and down) and it would flash in the same spot every 30 or so seconds. it flashed for a few minutes and then it stopped.  i was a little creeped out so i called my family out side. when they came out i got out of my car and then realized that these beams were all around the neighborhood.   they saw the lights and we didnt know what to really think of them.  i left my moms to start driving home, a little up the street i had to turn left , once i turned left there were more beams everywhere, there were three really bright ones right in front of me, i stopped my car and tried to get my phone out of my pocket as fast as i could but when i looked up the three beams in the road were gone. ii was sad i couldnt get a picture of them but kept on driving.... i made a right and once i did there were probably fifty beams in an open field from the sky to the ground.... once i passed the field the beams of lights were gone.... i posted a status on my facebook and one of my friends saw the same lights in the same area of town.
content.summary: Straight beams of light that went from the sky to the ground

content.detailedDescription:
4 objects forming a triangle... flight and fade out in the sky.  i have been in this area since 2009 and is my 5th. time.   the 4th. time we were 4 witneses.

i was in my yard.  i notice because of the movement.

4 objects flying like they knew they were flying togheter.

i felt very happy and excited, almost crying but very disapointment that nobody else saw those light but me.

the objects just fade out... the were flying very fast.

the first object i saw in 2009 was huge!!!!!! very very very big!
content.summary: 4 stars flying in triangle shape, they were flying to the same point.

content.detailedDescription: went outside to smoke, foggy/snowy out. looked up and saw a dark gray v shape roughly 300-500 feet above, flying in a straight path. very dull, not really reflective. no lights, ruling out an airplane.
content.summary: Hoving "v" over castle rock
